column3: strong pepper bark. We hit just after the lunch rush so some disappointment. Ribs were average and dry the beef rib I should have returned
column4: charred and way over cooked with little meat. Chicken was good. Corn sides with some kind of creamed cheese was special
column5: the mustard potato salad was good
column6: The charro beans average - most Mexican places have better. bbq sauce was very good indeed!  Liked the regular and Jalapeno sausage.  $ 96 for what fits on one tray
